text: The women's heptathlon event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 22 and 23 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Kathleen Gutjahr ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Regla Cárdeñas ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Ding Ying ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22/23 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
